summary: I am a fan of all things JavaScript, with some of my favorite tools being TypeScript, Webpack, React, and Node.js.
Currently, I am actively looking for employment opportunities as a Web Developer.

As a self-taught software developer, I enjoy building modern web applications, whether it be a game just for fun or a tool to help improve productivity in my day-to-day life. After teaching myself to program and playing around with different technologies, I am looking to switch gears and transition it from a hobby to a profession.
